entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose `LambdaExpression` support for Compiled Queries #31604
  • RC1: UnreachableException when loading with proxies and a JSON-mapped complex property #31597
  • Incorrect version of dotnet ef tools - why so difficult to upgrade? #31596
  • Default value forced when converting an EXISTING string column to be non-nullable #31595

Closed

  • Sqlite: Cast from char to int gives incorrect results #23161
    8.0.0-rc2
  • CreateAggregate state is shared, breaking multiple use of an aggregate function in the same query #26070
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Exclude only base type table from Migrations #30079
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Block has-pending-model-changes when EF < 8 #31605
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31603
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31602
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31601
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • SQLite: Fix casting between int and char #31585
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.6-pre20230809203314 to 2.1.6 #31548
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update branding to 6.0.23 #31599
  • Update branding to 7.0.12 #31600
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Only try sqlite3_win32_set_directory on Windows and be more resilient #31532
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Use aggregate_context instead of user_state in CreateAggregate #31531
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31598
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Don't exclude from migrations derived tables for TPT and TPC #31594
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31582
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Validate complex properties are not null when saving #31584
